categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Tajis Durmin was a male Human Death Star trooper who was stationed on the first Death Star during the Galactic Civil War. In 0 BBY, he guarded the Death Star conference room and was among the Imperials when Cass reported the Rebel Alliance base on Dantooine. He was killed when the station was destroyed by Luke Skywalker at the Battle of Yavin.
Tajis Durmin was portrayed by Cy Town.[source?]
